enum  Flags {
  NoFlags,
  Bold = 1,
  Italic = 2,
  Underline = 4,
  Family = 8,
  Size = 16,
  Color = 32,
  Misspelled = 64,
  Font = Bold | Italic | Underline | Family | Size,
  Format = Font | Color | Misspelled
}
